DOC.brief_summary: To investigate the safety and effectiveness about administration of both donepezil hydrochloride and menatine hydrochloride in patients with Alzheimer's Disease in clinical practice.
DOC.brief_title: Post-marketing Surveillance of Donepezil Hydrochloride Investigation of the Safety and Effectiveness of Combination Therapy of Donepezil Hydrochloride and Memantine Hydrochloride in Patients With Alzheimer's Disease
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Patients diagnosed with Alzheimer's Disease who are to be administered both donepezil hydrochloride and memantine hydrochloride in clinical practice. Exclusion criteria: Patients with a history of hypersensitivity to any ingredients of Aricept or piperidine derivatives.
